pages.text: $(li)The Bane of Arthropods enchantment can be applied in any kind of $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_sword)$(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_sword)Sword$(/l)$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_axe)$(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_axe)Axe$(/l)$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/pickarang)$(l:patchouli:tools/quark/pickarang)Pickarang$(/l)$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/flamarang)$(l:patchouli:tools/quark/flamarang)Flamarang$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment increase the damage inflicted of arthropods like $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/spider)Spiders$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/cave_spider)Cave Spiders$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/silverfish)Silverfish$(/l).
pages.title: Bane of Arthropods

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level IV.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level V of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_bane_of_arthropods)Ancient Tome (Bane of Arthropods)$(/l).
